NewLineUsed: Please don't press Enter. New line symbol not allowed here
InvalidSplitCondition: Incrorect use of splitter, the word wasn't added
EmptyTerm: Incorrect or lack of info, word wasn't added
WordExists:
Such word already exists in main dictionary

Append an asterisk "*" before the term to add such one 
Example:
"ability" -> "*ability"
UserToWordExists: Such word already exists in your dictionary
NotEnoughExtraWords:
There's not enough words in your dictionary to learn.
Use "/add word" to add more words
